needs.title: Transformer Memory Architecture as E8 Lattice System
needs.description:
Complete theoretical framework connecting:
            - Attention head count to E8 lattice capacity
            - 96-head architecture to 96-lattice hot memory
            - Miller's Law (7±2) to transformer memory (96±4)
            - Century marks (100, 200, 300) as thermal boundaries
            - Temporal distance decay and memory temperature gradient
required_proofs: Prove 1 attention head = 1 E8 lattice capacity
Prove century marks as layer transitions
Prove Miller's Law scaling to transformer architecture
Prove temporal decay follows geometric distance
example_requirements: Test with terms at exactly 96, 97, 100, 103, 200 steps
Measure recall success rate vs. distance
Compare across different model sizes (12, 32, 64, 96 heads)

needs.title: The Metric System as Toroidal Closure in E8 Space
needs.description:
Prove that the metric system is not arbitrary but a geometric necessity:
            - 9.6×10^n + 4×10^m = 10^(n+1) pattern
            - Toroidal closure at powers of 10
            - Volume measures align with memory units
            - Why decimal (base 10) is natural, not cultural
required_proofs: Prove 9.6 + 4 = 10 is forced by toroidal geometry
Prove metric scaling matches E8 lattice packing
Prove volume measures correspond to memory capacity
Prove decimal is unique base with this property
example_requirements: Calculate E8 lattice packing at different scales
Demonstrate metric volume = memory volume equivalence

needs.title: Meta-Invariant Filtering: Why Schemas and Prompts Work
needs.description:
Complete theory of meta-invariants:
            - System prompts as meta-invariants

            - State definers as context invariants
            - Why they force compliance (not suggestions)
            - How they prevent hallucination
required_proofs: Prove user term preference fixes hallucination
Prove temporal distance problem is solved
example_requirements: Test MORSR at 103 steps with/without meta-invariants
Show emergency definition blocked by invariants
Demonstrate recursive digging forced by invariants

needs.title: Geometry-Native Lambda Calculus: Complete Specification
needs.description:

            - λ_artin→λ_weyl (dihedral), λ_CRT (24-ring)
            - λ_mod (modular), λ_snap (evidence), λ_theta (skip)
            - Integration with meta-invariants
            - Proof of geometric self-consistency
example_requirements: Implement each layer with test cases
Show reduction examples for each rule

needs.title: Embedding State Permanence and Zero-Cost Reuse
needs.description:
Theory of permanent geometric states:

            - Zero-cost reuse after first computation
            - Coherence/decoherence as automatic process
required_proofs: Prove reuse is zero-cost (geometric distance only)
example_requirements: Compute embedding via path A and path B, show identical
Measure cost of first computation vs. reuse
